ss.qwirkle.common

Class Move

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.qwirkle.common.Move

  • public class Move
extends java.lang.Object
    Object representing a move done by the player.
    Author:
    Dylan

      Move()

      • addTile

        public void addTile(Board b,
                    Tile tile,
                    int x,
                    int y)
             throws InvalidMoveException
        Adds a tile to the move.
        Parameters:
        b - The board instance of the game.
        tile - The tile to be added
        x - The x coordinate of the tile
        y - The y coordinate of the tile
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - Throws this when the move is not allowed
